title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, tools, and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support and model manager.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat and generate completions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community CLI wrapper with interactive REPL, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for CPU and GPU (CUDA, ROCm) inference with Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and list models.

title: ollama-cpp-py
summary: Python bindings for ollama.cpp exposing low-level inference with numpy arrays.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models via Slack threads.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama completions and image-to-text into any Discord server.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom GGUF models ready to pull into Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio-based async streaming.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing REST endpoints and admin UI to manage Ollama models and chat sessions.
